sections.heading: Disavowal action; proofThe husband may disavow paternity of the child by clear and convincing evidence that he is not the father
sections.text: The testimony of the husband shall be corroborated by other evidence.Amended by Acts 1976, No. 430, ยง1; Acts 1989, No. 790, ยง1; Acts 2005, No. 192, ยง1, eff. June 29, 2005
